title: Caregiver Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview was casual and professional. It was mostly to talk about my background and how it was related to the job I applied for. The person who interview me was the supervisor of the place where I am going to be working which helped me to understand and know individuals I was going to serve.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here

title: Graduate Trainee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Good Neighbors (Lusaka, Lusaka)
Interview Descriptions: It was ok for a first time interview. The place was hard to locate. The interview panel was friendly. I was expectant of getting a job with the organisation but unfortunately I didn't get the job. I learnt how to present myself to an interview
Interview Questions: How much is your salary expectation

title: Agribusiness Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Good Neighbors
Interview Descriptions: Case study followed by a panel group interview which was followed by presenting the Case study to the pannelists and other interviewed. The pannelists and the interviewees got a chance to critique the presentation.

title: Finance Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Good Neighbors (Dushanbe) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview started well, until one of the interviewer who is not even an HR manager, nor PM started asking very silly questions like spelling the words. LOL how is it even related to the job I am applying for.

title: Staff Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Good Neighbors
Interview Descriptions: They asked basic information and inform their roles. Asked about the previous work experiences and check the education levels. The interview meeting usually held with  two-three manager. Ask why do you want to work at non profit.

title: Administrative & Human Resources Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Good Neighbors (New York, NY) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions:
First Step: Written, Broad Question, Accounting,  Business Related Question
Second Step: Viva 5:5 system. So 5 Interviewer and 5 Interviewee together will be on the interview board. It Will take 7-10 days. and they will ask your certificate for 2-3 days. By this time they will verify it.
Interview Questions: Would you like to work outside of the city?

title: Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Good Neighbors (Bishkek) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: Accountants shout the administrative part, project part and lawyer part. Because Good Neighbors International has a lot of different projects in different sectors.  Accountants includes in Administrative Department (AD) only some branches (country) has Financial Departments (FD) and that's why Accountants should know job description between  Administrative Department (AD) and Financial Departments (FD).
Interview Questions: Why you want work with us?

title: Medical Officer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Good Neighbors (Dhaka) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Usual process. Advertise in the Newspaper then called for interview. Few questions about previous job and describe the job description. There is no accommodation for the employee. They we're very cordial during the interview. And again they are Christian organization and will always try to suppress you.
